title: CTBLocker
extract: Ransomware means a kind of software/infection that block or encrypt files on the user's system and asks for payment to be made in order to regain the files. ... CTB stands for "Curve-Tor- Bitcoin", the definition encompasses meaning of the core technology required to make this Virus/Ransomware.
extract_html: Ransomware means a kind of software/infection that block or encrypt files on the user's system and asks for payment to be made in order to regain the files. ... CTB stands for "Curve-Tor- Bitcoin", the definition encompasses meaning of the core technology required to make this Virus/Ransomware.
